about_the_game:
Buy the Monster Energy Supercross 3 - Outfit Starting Pack now and expand the customization options for your rider!

It includes two complete themed sets (like Thunder, Industrial or Pink Camo for female riders), each one of them with three helmets, goggles, suits, boots and bike liveries!
detailed_description:
Buy the Monster Energy Supercross 3 - Outfit Starting Pack now and expand the customization options for your rider!

It includes two complete themed sets (like Thunder, Industrial or Pink Camo for female riders), each one of them with three helmets, goggles, suits, boots and bike liveries!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 3.2 GHz - AMD A10-7850K, 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 2GB - AMD Radeon R7 370X 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4820K 3.7 GHz - AMD Ryzen 7 1700x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB - AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Buy the Monster Energy Supercross 3 - Outfit Starting Pack now and expand the customization options for your rider!

*languages with full audio support
